column3: 2019|4.0|false|0|0|false|false|||||||||||||||"Le descriptif de l’offre ci-dessous est en Anglais

column1: A propos du centre ou de la direction fonctionnelle
The Inria Lille - Nord Europe Research Centre was founded in 2008 and employs a staff of 360
column2: including 300 scientists working in sixteen research teams. Recognised for its outstanding contribution to the socio-economic development of the Hauts-De-France région
column3: the Inria Lille - Nord Europe Research Centre undertakes research in the field of computer science in collaboration with a range of academic

column1: The strategy of the Centre is to develop an internationally renowned centre of excellence with a significant impact on the City of Lille and its surrounding area. It works to achieve this by pursuing a range of ambitious research projects in such fields of computer science as the intelligence of data and adaptive software systems. Building on the synergies between research and industry
column2: Inria is a major contributor to skills and technology transfer in the field of computer science.

column1: The postdoc position is offered within the MEPHYSTO team at INRIA Lille. The team gathers internationally recognized mathematicians who aim at providing a better understanding of physical phenomena through their microscopic description. The main focuses are on model derivation
column2: study of stationary states and asymptotic behaviours
column3: links between different levels of description (micro/macro models) and numerical methods to simulate such models.

column1: The postdoc student will benefit from the interaction with the team members and will be able to participate in several activities hold at the Mathematics Department (Laboratoire Paul Painlevé) at the University of Lille.

The post-doctoral work will concentrate on the theoretical study of microscopic models and their consistency with the physical phenomena under consideration. The numerical simulation of such models will also be of high interest in order to check their accuracy. This work will be supervised by Marielle Simon.
The postdoctoral fellow will conduct her/his research within the MEPHYSTO team
column2: at INRIA Lille. She/he will write research articles and present her/his work at international conferences. She/he will also attend working groups and other local activities related to the project at Université de Lille.

column1: Candidates are required to have good knowledge of probability theory and experience in the mathematical derivation of microscopic models. Competences in numerical simulations are highly appreciated.
Partial reimbursement of public transport costs
Leave: 7 weeks of annual leave + 10 extra days off due to RTT (statutory reduction in working hours) + possibility of exceptional leave (sick children
Possibility of teleworking (after 6 months of employment) and flexible organization of working hours

column2: cultural and sports events and activities

column3: 2019|4.6|false|0|0|false|false|||||||||||||||"Hiring Key Accounts Manager for an For a private Pharmaceutical Company with activities in the Gulf region and promoting products in the category of Cancer care & support

column1: ***Candidate must have an experience working with local Hospitals in the UAE in the role of Medical rep / Sales officer.
***Bachelor’s degree in life science or (bio) medical/pharmaceutical sciences. Additional qualification in Business Management desired.
***Fluency in spoken English is a must. Arabic is desired.
***Residency & valid driving license in UAE is a must.
***Will be reporting to Head of Business unit.
***Compensation is not a constraint for the right candidate.
 Maximizes sales of company products in assigned territory
 Implements agreed on P.O.A inline with marketing strategy
 Builds& maintains high-quality customer relationships & internal cross-collaboration
 Knows in-depth knowledge of the product(s)
 Collaborates with manager to develop and implement territory P.O.A and key account plans
 Evaluates progress vs. plan monthly and agrees to course corrections with manager
 Contributes to agree on key account plan objectives/responsibilities
 Engages with peers and Division manager to learn best practices
 Follows through on customer commitments and requests in a timely fashion
 Reports customer activity in the CRM system and ensures customer profiles are kept up to date
 Operates within the agreed expense budget aligned with P.O.A priorities
Note : Apply with subject line as KAM.
Only the application with above mentioned criteria will be contacted. Interested professionals may share in your updated profiles to cv @ fasttracksolutions.ae immediately.

• Key Account Management: 5 years (Required)
  • Hospitality Management Pharmacy: 5 years (Required)
